column2: title=Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 19 June 2012

column1: '''''Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 19 June 2012''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's. The catalogue includes the following sales of letters by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]:
*Lot 252: letter from Tolkien to Elena Jeronimides (see [[Letter to Elena Jeronimides]]).
*Lot 251: letter from Tolkien to Roger Verhulst (see [[Letter to Roger Verhulst (9 March 1966)]]).<ref>{{webcite
